channel.title: The Politician
channel.description: Ever wonder what a great DJ sounds like? Have you ever wanted to hear a mix that flows smooth without any interruptions? Are you in need for memorable mixes for your Ipod, Ipad or mp3 player? - This is the place to download them for free, all we ask is that you share this page with your friends and become a follower.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Now booking dates: 1+424.234.9610 or booking@djricosanchez.com
channel.itunes:author: djricosanchez
channel.itunes:summary: Ever wonder what a great DJ sounds like? Have you ever wanted to hear a mix that flows smooth without any interruptions? Are you in need for memorable mixes for your Ipod, Ipad or mp3 player? - This is the place to download them for free, all we ask is that you share this page with your friends and become a follower.

item.title: Nikki Beach Lounge Sessions - The Politician
item.description: A new mix featuring some of the Summer's Hottest House & Pop anthems gracing the lounges of Nikki Beach and South Florida... all smoothly blended by The Politician, Rico Sanchez ;) Nikki Beach Lounge Sessions - The Politician 01. Lady Loca ft. Crossfire - Juan Magan 02. Hotel Nacional (Razor N Guido Club Mix) - Gloria Estefan 03. Yo No Soy Un Monstruo (Sensei of Hit Legends Remix) - Elvis Crespo 04. Goin In - Jennifer Lopez ft. Flo Rida & Lil Jon 05. Miracle (Ralphi Rosario Club Mix) - Norka 06. Ai Se Eu Te Pego (Worldwide Remix) - Michel Telo ft. Pitbull 07. Mon Amour - Mondello ft Charlie P. 08. Primadonna - Marina and the Diamonds 09. Sorry for Party Rocking (Kingz vs Axwell Big Room Bootleg) - Anthem Kingz 10. Good Time - Craig David ft. Calvin Harris 11. Put your Graffiti On Me (Bimbo Jones Remix) - Kat Graham 12. Ella No Sigue Modas - Juan Magan ft. Don Omar 13. Boyfriend - Justin Bieber (Dada Life Remix)
item.dc:creator: djricosanchez
item.itunes:summary:
A new mix featuring some of the Summer's Hottest House & Pop anthems gracing the lounges of Nikki Beach and South Florida... all smoothly blended by The Politician, Rico Sanchez ;)
Nikki Beach Lounge Sessions - The Politician
01. Lady Loca ft. Crossfire - Juan Magan 02. Hotel Nacional (Razor N Guido Club Mix) - Gloria Estefan 03. Yo No Soy Un Monstruo (Sensei of Hit Legends Remix) - Elvis Crespo 04. Goin In - Jennifer Lopez ft. Flo Rida & Lil Jon 05. Miracle (Ralphi Rosario Club Mix) - Norka 06. Ai Se Eu Te Pego (Worldwide Remix) - Michel Telo ft. Pitbull 07. Mon Amour - Mondello ft Charlie P. 08. Primadonna - Marina and the Diamonds 09. Sorry for Party Rocking (Kingz vs Axwell Big Room Bootleg) - Anthem Kingz 10. Good Time - Craig David ft. Calvin Harris 11. Put your Graffiti On Me (Bimbo Jones Remix) - Kat Graham 12. Ella No Sigue Modas - Juan Magan ft. Don Omar 13. Boyfriend - Justin Bieber (Dada Life Remix)

item.title: Mainstream Radio Vol. 2
item.description: Mainstream Radio Vol. 2 - The Politician, Rico Sanchez 01. Jackpot - Lloyd Banks 02. I Need Dollas - T.I. 03. Lil Freak - Stuey Rock 04. Faded - Tyga ft. Lil Wayne 05. Too Short - Vell ft.YG 06. Ayy Ladies - Travis Porter ft. Tyga 07. Okay with Me - Gucci Mane ft. 2 Chainz 08. Cashout - Cashinout 09. Mercy - Big Sean, Pusha T & Kanye West 10. Strange Clouds (RMX) - B.o.B ft. Young Jeezy & T.I. 11. Way Too Gone - Young Jeezy ft. Future 12. Take it to The Head - Dj Khaled ft. Rick Ross, Chis Brown, Nicki Minaj & Lil Wayne 13. Magic - Future ft. T.I. 14. I'm Working - Superstar K 15. Lights down low - Bei Maejor ft. Waka Flocka 16. Till I Die - Chris Brown 17. Aural Psynapse (Myndset RMX) -Deadmau5 18. We Are Young ft. Janelle Monae - FUN 19. Changed the way you Kiss Me - Example ft. Ludacris 20. What Makes you Beautiful (Dave Aude RMX) - One Direction 21. Glad You Came (HLM RMX) - The Wanted 22. Richest Man - Play n Skillz ft. Pitbull 23. Starships (Justin Sane RMX) - Nicki Minaj 24. Metropolis - David Guetta, Nicky Romero 25. We found Love, Whitney Houston Memorial Mix - Rihanna (Deville's Party Starter) 26. Rolling Stone T-Shirt (Cazzette Approaching Starry Homes Mix) - Dada Life, Cazzette 27. We Own the Night ft. Luciana - Tiesto 28. Wild Ones ft. Sia - Flo Rida 29. Somebody that I used to Know (Mike D RMX) - Gotye ft. Kimbra 30. Where have you been (Vice RMX) - Rihanna Here's Volume 2 of Mainstream Radio mix for those who enjoy radio friendly hits. Some of these songs you might recognize some you might not, however this is current pop at its best. Enjoy! Don't forget to refer my podcast to your friends and fellow mp3 player or ipod/ipad owners. Hit the Follow Button... Fans are Great! www.soundinfantry.com | www.tsmusik.com | www.djricosanchez.com Follow on twitter @djricosanchez Facebook.com/djricosanchezthepolician Now taking dates: 1+424.234.9610

item.title: Burn Studios residency mix
item.description: Here's a quick 20 min. mix, for mixcloud's burn studios competition. 1. Somebody that I used to know - Gotye 2. We are young ft. Janelle Monae (Alvin Risk RMX) - FUN 3. Fatility - Afrojack 4. Titanium (Cazzettes Ant Seeking Hamster RMX) - David Guetta ft. Sia 5. Rolling Stone T-Shirt (Cazzette Approaching Starry Homes Mix) - Dada Life 6. Chasin - Sander Van Doom 7. The Night Out (Madeon RMX) - Martin Solveig, The Night Out 8. Girls Gone Wild - Madonna vs Avicii

1. Somebody that I used to know - Gotye 2. We are young ft. Janelle Monae (Alvin Risk RMX) - FUN 3. Fatility - Afrojack 4. Titanium (Cazzettes Ant Seeking Hamster RMX) - David Guetta ft. Sia 5.
